build.beforeBundleCommand: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if ($env:RESHACKER_PATH -and (Test-Path 'target\release\cockpit-tools.exe')) { Write-Host '[INFO] Stripping exe metadata...'; & $env:RESHACKER_PATH -open 'target\release\cockpit-tools.exe' -save 'target\release\cockpit-tools.exe' -action delete -mask 'VERSIONINFO,,'; Write-Host '[SUCCESS] Done!' } else { Write-Host '[SKIP] RESHACKER_PATH not set or exe not found' }"
